customer_addr:

citations.narrative:
There are two panels in the outdoor area of the sheltered enclosure that have approximately 3 inch areas of rusted pipe
that had broken through about 1/3 of the diameter of the metal pipe.
These areas of rust prevent the panels from being fully cleaned and sanitized. Areas that can not be fully sanitized can
become harborages of disease and rusted edges could cause injury to the animals.
Correct by date August 4th 2023 by ensuring all parts of the primary enclosure that the animal comes into contact with are
able to be adequately sanitized and cannot injure the animals.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
Additional Inspectors:
COURTNEY JERNIGAN, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER
Sheydanis DiazMartinez, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
3.6(a)(2)(ix) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
There are two panels in the outdoor area of the sheltered enclosure that have approximately 3 inch areas of rusted pipe 
that had broken through about 1/3 of the diameter of the metal pipe. 
These areas of rust prevent the panels from being fully cleaned and sanitized. Areas that can not be fully sanitized can 
become harborages of disease and rusted edges could cause injury to the animals.  
Correct by date August 4th 2023 by ensuring all parts of the primary enclosure that the animal comes into contact with are 
able to be adequately sanitized and cannot injure the animals. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
COURTNEY JERNIGAN, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER 
Sheydanis DiazMartinez, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
